summary: A daring parrot recounts how Robinson Crusoe came to be stranded on a tropical island.
cast: Matthias Schweighöfer|Kaya Yanar|Ilka Bessin|Dieter Hallervorden|Aylin Tezel|Ghadah Al-Akel|Tommy Morgenstern|Melanie Hinze|Bert Franzke|Tobias Lelle|Gerald Schaale|Jesco Wirthgen|Jan Makino|Axel Lutter|Jan-David Rönfeldt|Claudio Maniscalco|Tilo Schmitz|Francois Smesny|Doug Stone|Kirk Thornton|Colin Metzger|Michael Sorich|Yuri Lowenthal|Sandy Fox|Jay Jones|Marieve Herington|Carlos Alazraqui|Jeff Doucette|Debi Tinsley|Laila Berzins|Joe Ochman|Lex Lang|Joey Camen|George Babbit|Kyle Hebert|David Howard|Terri Douglas

title: Robinson: Una aventura tropical
